item.longLabel:
Entity Object
Represents a database table and implements business rules

Domain
Represents a complex datatype or implements type-level validation

Association
Defines a relationship between two entity objects

Unidirectional Association
Defines a unidirectional relationship between two entity objects

View Object
Retrieves data from a datasource and exposes to clients

Entity Object Usage
Defines a reference to an entity object within a view object

View Link
Defines a relationship between two view objects

Application Module
Organizes view objects, handles transactions and provides business service methods

View Object Instance
Defines an instance of a view object within an application module's data model

View Link Instance
Defines an instance of a view link within an application module, linking two view objects instance

Application Module Instance
Defines an instance of an application module within another's data model

Extends
Defines the supertype of a business component of the same type

Dependency
Represents where one diagram element depends on another

Link
Links to another diagram or URL

Attachment
Attaches annotations to other diagram elements

application-data.name: Java Application [Swing, ADF BC]
application-data.description: This application template is configured for building a data-bound rich client application. It consists of one project for the client (ADF Swing), and another project for the data model (ADF Business Components).

application-data.name: Web Application [JSP, Struts, ADF BC]
application-data.description: This application template is configured for building a data-bound web application. It consists of one project for the view and controller components (JSP and Struts), and another project for the data model (ADF Business Components).

application-data.name: Web Application [JSF, ADF BC]
application-data.description: This application template is configured for building a data-bound web application. It consists of one project for the view and controller components (JSF), and another project for the data model (ADF Business Components).

feature-hook.description: Provides support for Data Binding and ADF Business Components
